experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Second team lead in PMC, tourism & planning consultancy vertical. Main types of projects:Experience in first ICZMP in India at Digha-Shankar Beachfront - a World Bank project- Beachfront Area Development Plan (part of Integrated Coastal Zone Management Plan)Experience of 9 CDP & DDP, both onsite & offsite interventions- City Development Plans- Appraisal of Draft Development Plans, Experience of  Development of Tourist Circuit and Destinations- Development of Mega Tourist Circuit: North Bengal Mega Circuit connecting 36 destinations- 2 other circuit development in West Bengal etc.Experience of  Project Management Consultancy for Ministry of Textiles- Proposal for 8 Textile Parks of which 2 were approved for Grant under SITP Schemes and 1 is under consideration for other scheme.Experience of  Preparation of Master Plan of Industrial Park- Proposal for several Industrial Parks, including module designExperience of several Others type of works- Feasibility Analysis, - Detailed Project Reports, Experience of Developing Business through out my career- Bid Preparation & Submission- Preparing Financial- Attending Pre-bids & Bid OpeningAlso involved in preparation of concept level architectural layouts for the DPRs and business development works.
